main.bio: I am a gamer at heart, with a cheerful spirit, and a passion for coding. After graduating, I pursued my first job to kick off my career. I was hired as a Systems Engineer by Infosys, where I still work today. Since beginning of my career there, I have been given the opportunity to work on different technologies for the company and now I am currently working towards becoming a full stack developer.
main.contactmessage: Have a project for me? Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email or by using the form below if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I'm a tinkerer and am always interested in playing around with new technologies, and already went through stack technologies like Django-React, MEAN & MERN but the ones that have really won me over is React Js, Node JS & MongoDB

education.degree: Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science & Engineering

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Worked on different projects interacting with different people from both client and company side. Gain a lot of exposure and experience through it and always strive to become a better person & employee with each day.

projects.title: WhatsApp Clone
projects.category: WhatsApp Clone built with ReactJs and Firebase for Real time database and web hosting
